title: Chinese netizens are debating this company's forced 'filial piety tax' on staff
text:
Chinese netizens are debating this company's forced 'filial piety tax' on staff 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
A Guangzhou company's policy to deduct a portion of its employees' monthly wages to give to their parents has sparked discussion on Chinese ...
